column2: ENGLISH
Take a Hostage
You have captured a child of your once enemy and can take them as a hostage.
column3: Vous avez capturé un enfant de votre cible et vous pouvez à présent l'utiliser comme otage

column2: Take [Root.GetFirstName] Hostage

[From.GetFirstName] is having trouble adapting to our culture. Being from elsewhere, [From.GetSheHe] is having trouble befriending the other children of the court. Perhaps I should help [From.GetHerHim].
column3: [From.GetFirstName] a de la difficulté à s'adapter à notre culture, peut-être devrais-je l'aider à se faire des amis

column2: Bring [From.GetFirstName] to meet with some other children.
I'm sure [From.GetFirstName] will do fine on [From.GetHerHis] own.
column3: Je suis sûr que [From.GetFirstName] fera de son mieux pour [From.GetHerHis]

column2: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] seems to have a natural talent for charming others and has even made friends with some of the other children in the court!
column3: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] est incroyable, [From.GetSheHe] a un talent naturel pour charmer les autres

column2: That's good.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] is having some success in [FromFrom.GetHerHis] endeavors, even making some friends
column3: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] est certain d'avoir un certain succès avec [From.GetHerHis], et même quelques accointances

column2: I'm proud of [FromFrom.GetHerHim].
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] is still unable to make friends, despite [FromFrom.GetHerHis] efforts. The other children at court still keep their distance from [FromFrom.GetHerHim].
column3: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] essaie de faire de son mieux mais n'arrive à rien

column2: Perhaps [FromFrom.GetFirstName] will manage in time.
column3: Peut être que [FromFrom.GetFirstName] va y arriver avec le temps

column2: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] is being bullied by [FromFrom.GetHerHis] peers and has taken to hiding away in [FromFrom.GetHerHis] room.
column3: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] passe un moment difficile et a pris pour pour résolution de se cacher loin dans sa chambre [FromFrom.GetHerHis]

column2: Maybe this was a bad idea.
column3: Peut être que c'était une mauvaise idée

column2: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s attempts to make friends has had the opposite effect. [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has made fast enemies with a number of the children at court.
column3: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] a effectué plusieurs tentatives d'évasions, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] a été démasqué et retourne au château dans un piteux état

column2: I should have stepped in.
For seemingly the hundredth time this year, [From.GetFirstName] has approached you asking when, if ever, [From.GetSheHe] will get to return home.
I don't have time for this.
But [From.GetFirstName], you ARE home!
